column4: everytime i start gvim i get a SHELL variable empty error, previously i was using ~/.xinitrc, but now i'm using the default gnome session, where do i set the SHELL variable?
what is 'the right way' for me to be able to use the windows key as a modifier in gnome and launch custom applications?
keyboard shortcuts under Computer>Desktop Preferences>Keyboard Shortcuts
the keyboard shortcuts applet doesnt take the windows key as a modifier for some reason
